newsitem.title: GERMANY: Benetton looking for German publishing partner. [CORRECTED 15/7 04:24]
newsitem.headline: Benetton looking for German publishing partner. [CORRECTED 15/7 04:24]

text.p: Italian fashion group Benetton is looking for a German publisher for its in-house-produced magazine Colors, marketing newsletter New Business reported on Monday.

Benetton creative director Oliviero Toscani told New Business he hoped to finding a German publishing house which would serve as a partner of the magazine, but said Colors would continue to be designed by the company.
Toscani also reiterated that Benetton will continue to plan and realise its own campaigns (corrects to clarify Benetton's plans), New Business reported.
